text: Shiva, stage name of Andrea Arrigoni (born August 27, 1999) is an Italian rapper and singer. He debuted with the studio album Tempo anima in January 2017. In 2020 his single "Auto blu" featuring Eiffel 65 peaked number 1 of FIMI's single chart for three weeks. == Controversies == On 26 October 2023, Shiva was arrested for attempted murder for a shooting dating back to July of the same year, in which two young people were injured in the legs in the courtyard of his record company. According to the investigators, the attempted murder occurred at the height of the attempted attack that the two injured young people carried out against Shiva and his friends. == Discography == === Studio albums === * Tempo anima (2017) * Solo (2018) * Dolce Vita (2021) * Milano Demons (2022) * Santana Season (2023) === EPs === * Routine (2020) * Dark Love (2022) == References == Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Rappers Category:Italian rappers
